intro: When I'm not coding, I love spending time outdoors hiking with friends, playing tennis on weekends, and planning my next travel adventure. I enjoy learning new tools and sharing what I know with other developers.
whatFuelsMe: My perfect weekend includes an early morning hike, a tennis match with friends, and good coffee while talking about new ideas. I bring that same energy and curiosity to building products every day.
principles: Always think about what users need
Build small, test often, keep improving
Make things easy to use and fast
